attributes.action: Overturn ban on face masks in schools and make them optional for pupils & staff
attributes.additional_details: Forbidding children and staff to wear a face mask is clearly endangering them, especially those whose health is more vulnerable than others. There is also the risk of children catching Covid-19 and spreading it to their families.
attributes.background: The Government clearly believes that face masks provide additional protection against Covid-19, hence the requirement to wear them in shops and on public transport. This ban restricts people’s freedom to protect themselves.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Require schools to allow children to wear face masks at school due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/331468

Require schools to allow staff to wear face coverings whilst at work: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324050
